messages.subject: Re:  Re: Games
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/29/2003 3:04:36 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... How about ugly little kids? Are you saying they d have a harder time?
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/29/2003 3:04:36 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
>> And even pretty little kids would get it quickly. Cool game.
> Kathryn>>

How about ugly little kids? Are you saying they'd have a harder time?
*************************
No, I'm saying the pretty little kids would have a harder time. I said EVEN
pretty little kids. The ugly ones are smart. The pretty ones are just
pretty...especially the blond ones.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
